alert.note: Alert for Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 29 at 2:03AM MDT until October 30 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest Texas. * WHEN...From this evening through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County
